description: This file is a Java class that handles global exceptions in a Spring Boot application, mapping various exceptions to appropriate HTTP responses.

classes.name: GlobalExceptionHandler
classes.description: A Spring Boot ControllerAdvice class that globally handles exceptions thrown in the application, mapping them to HTTP responses.

methods.name: handleNotFound
methods.description: Handles NotFoundException by returning a 404 response with an error body.

methods.name: handleBadRequest
methods.description: Handles BadRequestException by returning a 400 response with an error body.

methods.name: handleValidation
methods.description: Handles validation exceptions by returning a 400 response with detailed field errors.

methods.name: handleOther
methods.description: Handles all other exceptions by returning a 500 response with an error body.

methods.name: errorBody
methods.description: Creates a standardized error response body with timestamp, code, and message.
